comments:
Every time I start eclipse I get an popup with the error "Exception occurred
running job"
The .log file shows the following stack trace

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks 4 0 2004-12-21 08:45:18.744
!MESSAGE Exception occurred running job.
!STACK 0
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: endRule without matching beginRule:
org.eclipse.wst.common.framework.operation.NonConflictingRule@b07848
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:58)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ImplicitJobs.end(ImplicitJobs.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.endRule(JobManager.java:464)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.WorkManager.checkInFailed(WorkManager.java:137)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.endOperation(Workspace.java:873)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1683)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.framework.operation.WTPOperation.run(Unknown Source)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.framework.operation.WTPOperationJobAdapter.run(Unknown
Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

WST version="1.0.0"
Eclipse 3.1.0 M4  (and M3 )

I haven't seen this problem in recent builds. I'm going to close it as
WORKSFORME, but if you are still seeing the problem please provide the details
of your setup.
